multiplechoiceresponse.p: A steady decline in the price level for many years indicates that Westeros has been experiencing deflation.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following agents is most likely to be negatively impacted by the deflation in Westeros?

choicegroup.choice: The Iron Bank of Bravos, which has loaned $1 million to the the King interest free
Hodor, who has $500 in a bank account earning 1% interest every year
The King, who owes a lot of money to the Iron Bank
A girl who has stored $20 in her mattress for 2 years
The elderly citizens of Westeros, who receive $200 every month as a pension
